wikipedia_page.main: Sir Ian Lamont Boyd,  (born 9 February 1957) is a Scottish zoologist, environmental and polar scientist, former Chief Scientific Adviser at the Department for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs (DEFRA) and is a professor of biology at the University of St Andrews. He is Chair of the UK Research Integrity Office.

response: * Ian L. Boyd (born 1957), Scottish zoologist and Chief Scientific Adviser at Defra
